e="preserve">Don Juan Manue - one of the largest writers of medieval Spain. He is best known as the author of the book " Count Lucanor " (1335).
Literary activity.
The literary work of Juan Manuel falls on the last 25 years of his life.
Juan Manuel did not write in Latin, but in Spanish.
"Count Lucanor".
The main literary achievement of Juan Manuel was the “Book of Examples of Count Lucanor and Patronio” (1335), better known as “ Count Lucanor ”.
The book consists of five parts. The first, most voluminous part, is 51 short stories.
Marriages and children.
Juan Manuel de Villena was married three times.
